function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 transmission via aerosol particles","Impact":"High risk of infection spread in the built environment","Mitigation":"Improving indoor ventilation and air filtration, reducing occupancy density","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-quality filters, ventilation systems","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in built environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health organizations"}]}
